title: Lightning Will Go for a Third Straight Stanley Cup Against the Avalanche
description: No team has been to three Stanley Cup finals in a row since the Edmonton Oilers in the mid-1980s, and the Islanders were the last team to win three consecutive Cups 40 years ago.
dc:creator: Ken Belson
media:credit: Nathan Ray Seebeck/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Lightning center and captain Steven Stamkos after scoring the game-winning goal against the Rangers in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference finals.
